tags: I'm sorry if there are any mistakes
english is not my first language
title: Romancing Jackie
body:
Nobody seems to talk about the fact that Jackie seems to be a part of a gang called Valentino’s according to his clothes (shirt and backside of jacket collar). The Cyberpunk wiki states them as “a poser gang dedicated to seducing the most attractive women in Night City“. 

These guys really seem to like women (and sex), so it’s not surprising that Jackie parked his car on the street with a strip club and other places fitting for some fun. Also makes me wonder if the little acupuncture shop offers some ehem… extra treatments? There was a magazine called “Ballsy” on the table.

So I wonder what kind of romance we’ll get with Jackie. Would he be ok with a serious relationship? Or maybe he’s just a one-night stand? Friends with benefits? Who knows, but I’m hoping for a little bit deeper relationship with him.

summary: honestly story might end up being the killer. story-driven makes me think there won't be anything dynamic or highly engineered...
body: honestly story might end up being the killer. story-driven makes me think there won’t be anything dynamic or highly engineered or new. leaving a run of the mill linear write. i’ve already said what i think even the best writing investment could stand to achieve. i don’t see them doing a quantic dream on this. and i don’t know if a few deus ex style late game branches still commands the same respect in 2018

reblog.comment: honestly story might end up being the killer. story-driven makes me think there won’t be anything dynamic or highly engineered or new. leaving a run of the mill linear write. i’ve already said what i think even the best writing investment could stand to achieve. i don’t see them doing a quantic dream on this. and i don’t know if a few deus ex style late game branches still commands the same respect in 2018

tags: i really cannot stress enough how much i disliked gtav
my whole experience was completely joyless
maybe this is a case of 'good multiplayer' syndrome
i aint got that kinda time
summary: im seeing positive signs of gorgeous art direction, seamless transitions and smooth shooter gameplay. all of which im presently...
body:
im seeing positive signs of gorgeous art direction, seamless transitions and smooth shooter gameplay. all of which im presently in the mood for after the last few open world experiences i’ve had which were really lost on me (really though gtav had it coming by not letting me pet the cat they script in right at the beginning. shameful)

on the neg side, character creation looking a little weaker and still not seen any groundbreaking game tech (unless you count the art design as its own breakthrough, but considering the scale of investment in this game its hard to say how reproducable their results might be)

im also seeing the phrase ‘story-driven’, in the same sentence as open world no less, which just… that might just be the stake to the heart of the whole beast for me… makes me recoil in horror. after playing gtav for tens of hours just to unlock enough access so i could play the supposedly open world game the way i had originally envisioned, i don’t know how much patience i’m gonna have for having the reigns ripped away from me again. seriously being trapped inside a set area for each mission so you can’t just go bring a helicopter to them all (each mission i didn’t even want to do, i was just trying to unlock gameplay) and actually have dumb fun if you want to. that’s not what i call open world. we’ll see how cyberpunk 2077 tries to handle this one

title: Cyberpunk 2077 tendrá modo foto
body:
#Cyberpunk2077 tendrá modo foto

CD Projekt confirma: habrá modo foto en Cyberpunk 2077 Los autores de The Witcher no ofrecen detalles sobre las opciones que ofrecerá en su nuevo RPG.

Ante los comentarios de algunos aficionados, que en las redes sociales han preguntado por la posibilidad de disfrutar en tercera persona de la acción de Cyberpunk 2077 para, así, “realizar sorprendentes capturas de nuestros personajes”, el equipo de

summary: I keep gushing over Meredith Stout and I can’t help it, her facial expressions were perfect. Her frowns and angry expressions...
body:
I keep gushing over Meredith Stout and I can’t help it, her facial expressions were perfect. Her frowns and angry expressions were fucking beautiful. AND she had a booty XD I’m doing a nonlethal run assuming that is still how the mission plays out just to see her up close. Hope she keeps the brown hair tho, saw that her pic was different from the shown hair color.

Still love her regardless already <3 And she looked like she was wearing bulletproof garb despite being in a dress so we might even see her kick some ass if her goons get put down. Cant wait <3 <3

summary: CD Projekt Red’s Cyberpunk 2077 will be the first game ever to make me want to play a female. The looks for V look so amazingly...
body:
CD Projekt Red’s Cyberpunk 2077 will be the first game ever to make me want to play a female. The looks for V look so amazingly badass and somehow the cybernetic attachments just seem cooler for futuristic badass chicks.

Course, her partner definitely looked awesome too.

But my urge to play as Lt Ortega from Altered Carbon is STRONG. 

Tho if I find out Meredith Stout is straight… well, guess Ortega’s gonna have to wait, lol.

summary: Can’t wait to play as a cybernetic black woman with electric dreadlocks in Cyberpunk 2077. I’m just disappointed that the...
body: Can’t wait to play as a cybernetic black woman with electric dreadlocks in Cyberpunk 2077. I’m just disappointed that the default voice is a white woman again. It’s to be expected, but I can’t help, but be a little bit disappointed.

reblog.comment: Can’t wait to play as a cybernetic black woman with electric dreadlocks in Cyberpunk 2077. I’m just disappointed that the default voice is a white woman again. It’s to be expected, but I can’t help, but be a little bit disappointed.

summary: Epic Length Cyberpunk 2077 Media Gameplay Video Made Public
title: Epic Length Cyberpunk 2077 Media Gameplay Video Made Public
body:
Epic Length Cyberpunk 2077 Media Gameplay Video Made Public

After a lot of buzz, CD Project Red has now capitulated to the excitement after they shared a 48 minute insight into their new title at E3 and Gamescom. As a result, you can now watch the Cyberpunk 2077 media gameplay video after the developers of The Witcher decided to finally release it.

Cyberpunk 2077 is a first-person shooter and RPG adventure, inspired by a classic tabletop game originally…

title: Cyberpunk 2077: What Do We Know?
body:
Cyberpunk 2077: What Do We Know?

Like many others in the gaming community, I am extremely excited about Cyberpunk 2077. I can’t wait to get my hands on it.

Since the moment it was announced at this years E3 they have played their cards rather close to their chests and not made a lot of information about the upcoming game public.

At least that was the case until a few days ago.

So, what do we know about Cyberpunk 2077?

Old news…

View On WordPress

summary: Cyberpunk 2077: Tanggal Rilis, Karakter, Setting, Dn Detail Lainnya !
title: Cyberpunk 2077: Tanggal Rilis, Karakter, Setting, Dn Detail Lainnya !
excerpt: Cyberpunk 2077 sudah pernah diumumkan pada tahun 2012 yang lalu, dan enam tahun terakhir cuplikan wawancara menggambarkan Cyberpunk 2077 sebagai game raksasa, bahkan lebih besar dari game yang dianggap sebagai game RPG terbaik sepanjang masa, yaitu The Witcher 3.

blog.name: gabriel-strange
blog.title: maybe i'm crazy
blog.description: 24, just a regular straight chilean geeky guy who likes comics, movies, video games, mlp, wild cards and do drawings and animations. also i love brony bacon , the brony community will understand what do i mean ;). and i reaaaaaally have a soft spot for martial arts comics; besides being an animation student, im an aspiring screenwriter, anti-sjw to the bone. Sometimes NSFW, if you want to see my full NSFW Blog, just ask nicely
